nodes.text: The Portmoak sector was in the Outer Rim Territories near Parmic sector. It also neighbored the Kibilini sector. Notable locations in Portmoak included Bridin Anchorage, Hyrol Preen Beta, Reuss VIII, and the Jermac system.
The sector was governed by Moff Ammar, a noted art collector.

Before 1 BBY, the Sullustan gambler Cunbus Locb visited several planets in this area, earned an amount of money, and left onboard his ship, Distant Wind, to the chagrin of several fleeced locals. Locb even managed to illegally obtain a flatsculp owned by Ammar, although Ammar then sent his forces after Locb, and they killed him.
